mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PROJECT ( F_PROJECT_ID, F_PROJECT_NAME, F_GRADLE_NAME, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE, F_COPYRIGHTS, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ projectId }, #{ projectName }, #{ gradleName }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note }, #{ copyrights }, #{ _lastUpdatedAt } )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PROJECT SET F_PROJECT_NAME = #{ projectName }, F_GRADLE_NAME = #{ gradleName }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note }, F_COPYRIGHTS = #{ copyrights }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt } WHERE F_PROJECT_ID = #{ projectId }
mapper.select: SELECT F_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", F_PROJECT_NAME AS "projectName", F_GRADLE_NAME AS "gradleName", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note", F_COPYRIGHTS AS "copyrights", F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt" FROM T_PROJECT WHERE F_PROJECT_ID = #{ projectId }
